description: Small clusters of colored orbs clinging to the walls beneath the pale arched windows cast the alcove in soft scarlet and buttery yellow light.  The polished surface of the oak table in the center of the small room gleams with ruddy highlights, and the velvety cushioning of the two armchairs positioned around it shimmers faintly with a golden sheen.  A plush tapestry rug covers the floor with rich reds and earthy browns separated by bright threads of gold.

Small clusters of colored orbs clinging to the walls beneath the dark arched windows cast the alcove in soft scarlet and buttery yellow light.  The polished surface of the oak table in the center of the small room gleams with ruddy highlights, and the velvety cushioning of the two armchairs positioned around it shimmers faintly with a golden sheen.  A plush tapestry rug covers the floor with rich reds and earthy browns separated by bright threads of gold.
title: [Library, Alcove]
